properties.name: Path
properties.description: The path to the instance profile.

type.description: The path to the instance profile.

properties.name: Roles
properties.description: The name of the role to associate with the instance profile. Only one role can be assigned to an EC2 instance at a time, and all applications on the instance share the same role and permissions.

type.description: The name of the role to associate with the instance profile. Only one role can be assigned to an EC2 instance at a time, and all applications on the instance share the same role and permissions.

properties.name: InstanceProfileName
properties.description: The name of the instance profile to create.

type.description: The name of the instance profile to create.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile.
